review: Quick and simple setup!  It uses your TV's HDMI port, not the USB.  I also have the Amazon Fire box for my other TV.  The Fire Stick remote does not have the voice command capability, but if you have a smartphone you can download the Fire TV app and use the app for the voice command.  I would recommend this to anyone who wants to pay less than $40 for the ability to access Amazon Video, Netflix, Hulu, etc., but if money isn't an object, go with the Fire TV box.
author: JULIE D GLEDHILL
